title: Deals: 11-inch M1 iPad Pro now $199 off, rare Philips Hue HomeKit discounts, more
content:
All of Thursday’s best deals are now up for the taking and headlined by 2022 lows on Apple’s latest 11-inch M1 iPad Pro. Then there’s the 15% off Philips Hue mix and match sale on HomeKit gear to go alongside these ongoing elago AirTag Ice Cream cases at $11. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: 11-inch M1 iPad Pro now $199 off, rare Philips Hue HomeKit discounts, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple 11-inch iPad Pro delivers M1 and Thunderbolt at new 2022 lows starting at $800 with up to $199 in savings, plus more.
